## Set Up Node.js Command Proxy Server

```Bash
$cd adb-proxy-socket
$npm install
$node proxy.js
```

## Start MCP Development Server for Premiere

```Shell
$cd mcp
$uv run mcp dev pr-mcp.py
```

## Install MCP Server for Premiere with Dependencies

```Shell
uv run mcp install --with fonttools --with python-socketio --with mcp --with requests --with websocket-client pr-mcp.py
```

## Start MCP Development Server for Photoshop

```Shell
$cd mcp
$uv run mcp dev ps-mcp.py
```

## Install MCP Server for Photoshop with Dependencies

```Shell
uv run mcp install --with fonttools --with python-socketio --with mcp --with requests --with websocket-client ps-mcp.py
```
